Entries.companionAccepted: Sure, farmer. Let's get to it!$1
Entries.companionRejected: I'm too busy with the farm today.$2
Entries.companionRejectedNight: Are you joking? Go get some sleep for Yoba's sake!$5
Entries.companionDismiss: Oh, sure thing. I'll get going.$0#$b#You know where to find me.$3
Entries.companionDismissAuto: Sorry, farmer. But I have to call it a night.$0#$b# Dont worry, I'll ask Yoba to look out for you.$8
Entries.giveForages: Hey, @, look what I found! Here, this is for you.
Entries.heal: Dear eight pound, six ounce, newborn Baby Yoba...$8
Entries.companion_SeedShop: I don't see how anyone can afford to shop at this place.$5#$b#Pierre's got some nerve charging so much...$2
Entries.companion_Desert: Nothin' but sand and there isn't even a Joja Mart... How could anyone live here?$7#$b#Looks like Yoba abandoned this place years ago.$8
Entries.companion_Town: In this town I only feel welcome at The Saloon, Shrine ta' Yoba, and Joja Mart.$2#$b#I'd much rather be out in the woods on my own...$8
